ReviewText: The material is soft, and it arrived quickly! Great quality and value.
Totally disappointed. The sole tore easily after one week. Cheap material and awful customer service.
Nice fit, but the sizing chart was tricky. The shipping was surprisingly fast, though.
Too small, the sizing is totally wrong! I must return it, and the return process seems slow.
Excellent shoes! They are very durable and I love the color. They arrived well packaged.
The plastic quality is terrible. I waited long for a response from the service team. Never buy again!
Best jacket ever! Fits perfect and the soft fabric is amazing.
Great quality and true to size. Delivery was delayed by one day.
It's fine. Neutral experience. Nothing special, but it serves its purpose.
The shirt is a bit tight but wearable. Customer service was helpful when I asked about exchanges.
This is heartbreaking. I ordered a 3XL and it was still too small. Terrible sizing!
Good shoes, but the tracking was confusing.
